{
    "number": 129736,
    "data": "7,37,14197,17050729021,332306984815842876487217260305275077",
    "name": "Primes of the form 4^n - 3^n.",
    "link": [
        "Muniru A Asiru, <a href=\"/A129736/b129736.txt\">Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..13</a>",
        "G. Everest et al., <a href=\"http://www.jstor.org/stable/27642221\">Primes generated by recurrence sequences</a>, Amer. Math. Monthly, 114 (No. 5, 2007), 417-431.",
        "K. Zsigmondy, <a href=\"https://doi.org/10.1007%2FBF01692444\">Zur Theorie der Potenzreste</a>, Monatsh. Math., 3 (1892), 265-284."
    ],
    "formula": [
        "a(n) = A005061(A059801(n)). - _Michel Marcus_, Feb 12 2018"
    ],
    "maple": [
        "select(isprime, [seq(4^n - 3^n, n=0..100)]); # _Muniru A Asiru_, Feb 09 2018"
    ],
    "mathematica": [
        "fQ[n_] := If[PrimeQ[4^n - 3^n], 4^n - 3^n, Nothing]; Array[fQ, 300] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Feb 12 2018 *)"
    ],
    "program": [
        "(MAGMA) [a: n in [0..300] | IsPrime(a) where a is 4^n-3^n] // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Nov 23 2010]",
        "(GAP) Filtered(List([1..100], n -> 4^n-3^n), IsPrime); # _Muniru A Asiru_, Feb 09 2018",
        "(PARI) lista(nn) = for(k=1, nn, if(isprime(p=4^k-3^k), print1(p\", \"))) \\\\ _Altug Alkan_, Mar 03 2018"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A005061, A059801, A129733, A129737."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn,changed",
    "offset": "1,1",
    "author": "_N. J. A. Sloane_, May 13 2007",
    "references": 2,
    "revision": 35,
    "time": "2018-03-03T22:54:02-05:00",
    "created": "2007-11-10T03:00:00-05:00"
}
